text: Mulund College of Commerce, sometimes referred to by the acronym MCC, is a college in Mulund West, Mumbai, India. It offers degree courses in commerce, information technology, computer science,accounting and related fields. The college was founded in 1970 by the Parle Tilak Vidyalaya Association and counts visionaries such as Shri Babasaheb Pethe and Shri Baburao Paranjpe among its founders. A junior college was started in 1976. The college is considered one of the top 10 commerce colleges in Mumbai. In 2004, it was accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council with an 'A' grade, which was subsequently renewed in 2011 and 2016. In the academic year 2019-2020 it completed its silver jubilee that is 50 years of teaching. The students from different departments organizes different fests throughout the year i.e IT(Information Technology) and CS( Computer Science) department organizes 'Technobeat'. BMM department organizes fest named 'Panache'. There are also other fests which are organized by other departments. College also has an annual fest named 'Spectrum'. This college also has Nss unit. == References == Category:Commerce colleges in India Category:Universities and colleges in Mumbai Category:Educational institutions established in 1970 Category:1970 establishments in India FYBSc CS Maharashtra, India.
